dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S1499 IS: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 278 Main Street in Chadron, Nebraska, as the Sergeant Cory Mracek Memorial Post Office.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Johanns (for himself and Mrs. Fischer) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 278 Main Street in Chadron, Nebraska, as the Sergeant Cory Mracek Memorial Post Office.

section.header: Sergeant Cory Mracek Memorial Post Office

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 278 Main Street in Chadron, Nebraska, shall be known and designated as the Sergeant Cory Mracek Memorial Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Sergeant Cory Mracek Memorial Post Office.
